abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed project would help the
            Dominican Electricity Corporation (CDE) in preparing two
            high priority projects in the energy sector for possible
            consideration by the Bank at a later date.  These two
            projects include:  (a) a coal terminal at the port of Haina,
            with land transport connections to the steam-electric
            generating plant at Itabo (now nearing completion) and
            related ash handling installations; and (b) a proposed power
            project comprising rehabilitation of existing thermal
            generating plants and reduction of power system losses.
